Provo.Mount Timpanogos Transit Center: The Mount Timpanogos Transit Center is a staffed, open air bus transfer station in southeast Orem, Utah, United States. It functions as both the Utah Transit Authority's (UTA) customer service center for Utah County, as well as a bus transfer center for UTA's buses in east central Utah Valley. At one point (prior to the opening of the FrontRunner commuter rail extension south to Provo in 2012) it was the busiest bus stop within the entire UTA bus system.
